headline: 3 Reasons to Buy Honeywell Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: Honeywell bucked the trend in earnings season and raised the midpoint of its guidance.  Honeywell is headed for a breakup, and all three of its future businesses are in good shape with an excellent opportunity to extract value from them.  Given the uncertainty created by the ongoing tariff conflict, investors have braced themselves for a slew of downgrades to full-year guidance from industrial companies.
